apk-cheater
============================================================
| Memory editor with frida-gadget

.. code:: sh

  $ pip install frida-gadget 
  $ pip install apk-cheater
  $ frida-gadget {APK_PATH}
  > Gadget APK: {GADGET_APK_PATH}
  ... singing and running your usb device ..
  $ apk-cheater
  1: scan
  2: show
  3: next
  4: edit
  >
